info.name: Twitter -- Simple Blue Bar Glow
info.description:
This will only change the top bar and the option list

Looks better if your background is dark

HEED,

I did another twitter skin, this time a complete skin... here is the link http://userstyles.org/styles/55522/twitter-dark-calm-blue-glow
